author: DWSR
body: In an effort to make Powershell scripts more consistent when executing them from another shell (i.e. `pwsh script.ps1` or `./script.ps1`) in a Linux/Unix-like fashion, it would be great to add `--help` as a way to get detailed help from the script file (through comment based help or `HelpMessage`).
title: Add --help Support Via [CmdletBinding()]
